list_of_reviews.review_title: COINBASE Urgent Assistance Needed: Missing Bitcoin Transaction
list_of_reviews.review: I am writing to bring to your attention a concerning issue regarding a Bitcoin transaction on my Coinbase account. On 2023-12-30, I received a Bitcoin transaction which was initially pending. However, shortly after, my account was flagged for KYC (Know Your Customer) verification by Coinbase. This verification process took an unexpectedly long time, lasting 138 days, before finally completing. Since then, I have been unable to locate the status of my Bitcoin transaction. I am concerned that it may be missing or held in a Coinbase cold wallet due to the KYC verification process. I kindly request your prompt assistance in investigating this matter and providing clarification on the status of my Bitcoin transaction. Any information or guidance you can provide would be greatly appreciated. Thank you for your attention to this urgent matter. I look forward to your prompt response. CASE ID# 19366248ZAIN AHMAD

Additionally, there are serious allegations regarding poor customer support and attempts to manipulate review integrity, which undermine user confidence. To improve, the company should focus on enhancing customer support, ensuring genuine and personalized engagement, and maintaining transparent and authentic review practices.
